shapes

Class Polygon

  • java.lang.Object
    • shapes.Shape
      • shapes.Line
        • shapes.Polygon
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, Rotatable, Scalable, Skewable, Translatable, UniformScalable

    public class Polygon
extends Line
    Represents a Polygon on the canvas. This class is strongly based on Line, since they both share the same attributes.
    See Also:
    Line, Shape, Serialized Form

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Polygon()
      Creates a new Polygon with default attributes.
